DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate nutrition bar consumption possible impact self-reported rating hunger fullness compare control .
DOC.detailed_description: Participant eligibility screen visit 1 . Test day commence 8 10 a.m. visit two four space four day apart . On visit day participant consume nutrition bar ; satiety hunger rating , blood sample collect simultaneously three hour period . After completion , participant complete gastrointestinal ( GI ) tolerability well Palatability Adverse Events questionnaires .
